clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in left lung lower lobe, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
